title: Nobody cares about illaoi when the poppy bomb was dropped

replies.body: Kinda true. People have been waiting for the Poppy rework for ages. So it's natural it steals the new characters thunder.
The ball was severely dropped with the timing if I must be honest.

Probably just one of those
"Hey, lets give the even more content to be excited about!"
and Poppy just ended up taking the spotlight with the whole
Ew -> Pretty change. I mean who would of expected that? And her new kit is so pretty and shiny and.....I forgot what champion are we talking about other than Poppy?

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=7vFt8j8s,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-25T18:01:24.900+0000)
>
> Sad face

I want to know what would happen to Poppy and her quest if she met Illaoi and went through the test. I mean, if Poppy's going to be shown her truth, she might have trouble reconciling with the fact that she'd basically been going around the world for nothing for X years, dont'cha think?
Well, giant buff tentacle lady thing or adorable and super awaited for rework for poppy? poppy for sure! xD

I suspect that is the reason she was revealed late in the day after illaoi's release.

Illaoi IS cool, but Poppy has needed a rework for SO long. Twoish weeks of hype is nothing to compare with the months-years of waiting for Poppy to finally get a rework.

I feel bad for the champion released around the time Taric's rework comes out.

Makes me feel like what happened with Atrox and Lucian.

When Atrox was announced, Lucian was leaked (Under the title "The Gun Templar").  After Lucian was leaked, no one really cared about Atrox.
In Lucian's defense, there aren't too many people out there that really care about Aatrox.  He's never been very popular

> [{quoted}](name=HaugheyPuck99,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=7vFt8j8s,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-11-25T19:06:27.519+0000)
>
> In Lucian's defense, there aren't too many people out there that really care about Aatrox.  He's never been very popular

True.  But, I also blame the fact that Atrox's kit doesn't reflect his lore.

hope people stopped playing with tentacles,its just too overwhelming,... i'm tired of dying to these phreaking tentacles that follows me everywhere i go "get off me i'm not into it, find someone else"
Yeah, it's was awful timing, really. :/ It's a shame because Illaoi is so much fun to play and is so important, ugh. It's like Aatrox, Lucian, Jinx bs all over again just more smashed together.
*Was more excited for Dragon Trainer Tristana than Illaoi*
I'm not going to lie,Poppy push Illaoi out of my head once the reworked dropped.
